visualisation.description:
Basic mapping visualisation.
The tileserver is confgurable.
It is typical to have to change Stroom's content security policy to allow this visualisation to connect to the tileserver.
E.g. to use OpenSteetView maps, you can change the property security.webContent.contentSecurityPolicy to somthing that includes the tile server for image data, e.g. "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.tile.osm.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-ancestors 'self';"
visualisation.name: GeoMap
